data.title: COVID REAL FACTS - STOP THE WAR ON LIFE
data.meta_description: Betrayal of trust is cheating; They are constantly deceiving humanity. They are betraying humanity by cheating. They are artificially creating death by imposing fake medicine. They are starting counterfeit wars. Everything from food to air is
data.text: Betrayal of trust is cheating; They are constantly deceiving humanity. They are betraying humanity by cheating. They are artificially creating death by imposing fake medicine. They are starting counterfeit wars. Everything from food to air is poisoned. They mercilessly make fake wars and slaughter innocent people, children, women, and men. They persecute people who speak the truth. They are imposing their own agenda on humanity. They misrepresent and undermine nature to sell their toxic product. No one should physically, psychologically, financially, or politically be punished, tortured, abused, harassed, or retaliated for speaking, spreading, or promoting the truth or nature. Everyone has the right to speak the truth. Everyone has the freedom of speech. Everyone has the right to spread the truth and science. Everyone has the right to expression. Over the past years, whoever is speaking the truth about the vaccines has been physically, psychologically, financially, or politically punished, harassed, tortured, abused, and retaliated for telling the truth about deaths caused by the vaccines. The inhumane politicians, pharmaceutical companies, and other agencies are misleading the citizens of the country to push and inject them with the toxic vaccination, which is manufactured of heavy poisonous materials. Inhumane politicians and their governments, pharmaceutical companies, and other agencies are deliberately misleading the citizens of the country by promoting and administering a vaccination that is allegedly manufactured using harmful and toxic materials. I saw many Television channels that are still promoting biological weapons under the guise of COVID-19 vaccines and promoting the COVID-19 preplanned pandemic illusion to deceive the citizens of the country. Now, people are dying of cardiac arrest, blood clots, cancer, and other non-naturally causing diseases following the COVID-19 vaccines. The deaths currently happening among citizens are caused by the COVID-19 vaccination due to inhumane activities or interventions rather than naturally occurring. The diseases currently happening among the citizens of the country are caused by exposure to harmful substances that are present in the COVID-19 biological weapons, also known as vaccines. The COVID-19 vaccines should be banned, and every criminal, perpetrator, or conspirator, whether they are hospital functionaries, pharmaceutical functionaries, drug companies, politicians, or anyone involved in this preplanned pandemic terrorism, should be punished for mass murdering the citizens of the country using the biological weapons under the guise of vaccination. They constantly cause people to feel distressed, and their actions consistently lead to people experiencing distress. People are always kept in a state of hopelessness by them. They continually ensure that people remain distressed. Their inhumane behavior perpetually keeps people in a state of distress. Vaccines are biocide, which means biological weapons. The societal-biased mainstream news media is constantly spreading lies against humanity that "vaccines are safe and effective." They are all fooling (deceiving) the public people and linking heart attacks or cardiac arrest with lifestyle, food, pollution, climate change, and the winter season to cover up the deaths that are caused by COVID-19 vaccines. The mainstream news media is spreading lies among people and deceiving them by promoting toxic products for their personal gain. However, when people die from these harmful products, which the media promotes, none of them speaks about the cause of death. When a corrupt wealthy person dies, or corrupt fake preachers die, or Corrupt politicians die, some news media organizations often generate a sense of distress among ordinary citizens and continuously play sad music and benefit from it. However, if an average citizen dies following COVID-19 vaccines-biological weapons, none of them even shed crocodile tears. The government forced Dr. O'Sullivan to take the COVID vaccination to continue practicing medicine. Now, he subsequently suffered Bell's Palsy because the vaccine was causative. People worldwide, including ordinary citizens, doctors, and nurses, are purportedly dying from cardiac arrest due to the injection of biological weapons disguised as vaccines. People from COVID-19 vaccines, including Chinese, Indians, Americans, Arabians, etc., are dying. People are curled up and falling and dying unwantedly due to the inhumane act. People are being cruelly treated, resulting in unfortunate deaths and injuries due to barbaric acts. The same bunch of inhumane corporations, politicians, and others are all creating the wars unwantedly. The cruel acts committed by certain corporations, politicians, and others are leading to unwanted wars. Those who created the illusion of a pandemic and those who are promoting the use of biological weapons disguised as vaccinations are now intentionally instigating wars, resulting in the tragic loss of life among children, women, and men. I kindly request the constitutional defenders and defenders of humankind within the judiciary to come forward and speak out against the use of biological weapons to help bring an end to war. We must stop betraying humankind by refraining from deceiving the present generation. Honesty and transparency are crucial in nurturing trust and ensuring a better future for all. Deceiving the present generation not only undermines their ability to make informed decisions but also hinders their progress and growth as individuals. We must prioritize truth and integrity to empower them. Betraying humankind through deceit denies the present generation the opportunity to learn from past mistakes and make meaningful contributions to society. It is our responsibility to provide them with accurate information and guide them toward a brighter future. The consequences of deceiving the present generation are far-reaching, leading to a breakdown in trust, division, and the perpetuation of harmful patterns. Let us break this cycle and foster an environment of openness and honesty. By choosing to be truthful and transparent, we not only honor our commitment to the present generation but also pave the way for a more just and compassionate society. Let us work together to stop betraying humankind and create a legacy of integrity for future generations. Admitting the truth instead of deceiving the present generation is crucial for the well-being of humankind, as it allows us to confront challenges head-on and find sustainable solutions. The act of admitting the truth not only serves to protect the present generation but also ensures the preservation of our collective humanity by fostering a culture of honesty and accountability. Embracing the truth empowers the present generation to make informed decisions, enabling them to navigate the complexities of the world and contribute positively to society. Admitting the truth is an act of courage that sets a powerful example for future generations, instilling in them the importance of transparency and integrity. The truth serves as a shield that safeguards humankind from the detrimental consequences of deception, allowing us to build a foundation of trust and unity. By admitting the truth, we demonstrate our commitment to the betterment of humankind, as it paves the way for healing, reconciliation, and progress. The act of admitting the truth is a transformative force that has the potential to break down barriers, foster understanding, and forge a path toward a brighter future for all. "No More War!" "Peace, Not War!" "End the Violence, Choose Peace!" "War is Not the Answer!" "Stop the Bloodshed, Promote Peace!" "War Divides, Peace Unites!" BAN THE BIOLOGICAL WEAPONS, STOP THE PREPLANNED WARS AND DEADLY PROPAGANDA, AND STOP BETRAYING HUMANKIND.
